ComicInfo.Summary:
In 1191, Maid Marian Fitzwalter must learn to fend for herself in a world that doesn’t recognise her agency as danger, intrigue and betrayal swirl around her in the wake of Prince John’s visit to Nottingham. Never-before-seen mysteries confront Everard Blackthorne, the Sheriff of Nottingham, culminating in an investigation that will lead directly into the climactic events of Nottingham Vol. 3.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-13 12:33:28. [CVDB971542]
